parameters.name: NTP_SERVERS
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of ntp servers to use

parameters.name: DEBUG_NET
parameters.description: If true will log all IPMGR HTTPS connection handshake errors.

parameters.name: AWS_MASTER_INSTANCE_TYPE
parameters.description: The AWS master instance type to use

parameters.name: AWS_NODE_INSTANCE_TYPE
parameters.description: The AWS node instance type to use

parameters.name: AWS_GLUSTERFS_INSTANCE_TYPE
parameters.description: The AWS GlusterFS instance type to use

parameters.name: AWS_WINDOWS2012R2_INSTANCE_TYPE
parameters.description: The AWS Windows 2012R2 instance type to use

parameters.name: AWS_LINUX_AMI
parameters.description: The AWS Linux AMI to use for Ubuntu 14.04.3

parameters.name: AWS_WINDOWS2012R2_AMI
parameters.description: The AWS AMI to use for Microsoft Windows Server 2012R2

parameters.name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
parameters.description: The AWS Access Key ID to use

parameters.name: AWS_SECRET_KEY_FILE
parameters.description: The AWS secret key file on disk

parameters.name: AWS_KEYPAIR_FILE
parameters.description: The AWS keypair file on disk

parameters.name: OS_COMPUTE_AZS_AND_STORAGE_AZS
parameters.description: OpenStack Storage and Compute Availability Zone Mapping

parameters.name: OS_LINUX_IMAGE_ID
parameters.description: OpenStack Linux Image ID for Ubuntu 14.04.3

parameters.name: OS_WINDOWS2012R2_IMAGE_ID
parameters.description: OpenStack Microsoft Windows Server 2012R2 Image ID

parameters.name: VS_LINUX_VMDK_SOURCE
parameters.description: VSphere VMDK source to use for Ubuntu 14.04.3

parameters.name: VS_WINDOWS2012R2_VMDK_SOURCE
parameters.description: VSphere VMDK source to use for Microsoft Windows Server 2012R2

parameters.name: VS_MASTER_NUM_VCPUS
parameters.description: Number of Virtual CPUs to use for Master

parameters.name: VS_NODE_NUM_VCPUS
parameters.description: Number of Virtual CPUs to use for Node

parameters.name: VS_GLUSTERFS_NUM_VCPUS
parameters.description: Number of Virtual CPUs to use for Gluster Filesystem

parameters.name: VS_WINDOWS2012R2_NUM_VCPUS
parameters.description: Number of Virtual CPUs to use for Windows Server

parameters.name: VS_MASTER_MEM_MB
parameters.description: Memory in MB to use for Master

parameters.name: VS_NODE_MEM_MB
parameters.description: Memory in MB to use for Node

parameters.name: VS_GLUSTERFS_MEM_MB
parameters.description: Memory in MB to use for Gluster FS

parameters.name: VS_WINDOWS2012R2_MEM_MB
parameters.description: Memory in MB to use for Windows Server

parameters.name: PGDATA
parameters.description: Postgres data directory location. This must be the same as the pgsql volume mount point.

parameters.name: PGPORT
parameters.description: Port that the Postgres server listens on. This must match the service port definition.

parameters.name: POSTGRES_SSL_ENABLED
parameters.description: Set to true to enable SSL mode in both pgpool2 and pgsql

parameters.name: POSTGRES_SSL_CERTIFICATE
parameters.description: Password file containing the super user's password. This is a server-side parameter.

parameters.name: POSTGRES_SSL_KEY_FILE
parameters.description: Password file containing the super user's password. This is a server-side parameter.

parameters.name: POSTGRES_INITDB_ARGS
parameters.description: Optional arguments to Postgres initdb operation. This is a server-side parameter.

parameters.name: NATS_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: Secret file location to use in NATS

parameters.name: NATS_NUM_NODES
parameters.description: Number of Nats Nodes in the deployment

parameters.name: NATS_SERVER_FLAGS
parameters.description: Flags to pass in to the gnatsd server

parameters.name: FLIGHTRECORDER_EXPIRE_HOUR
parameters.description: Time in hours after which task logs should be expired and not be available anymore

parameters.name: UAA_ADMIN_CLIENT_SECRET_FILE
parameters.description: Client Secret for initial UAA Admin Client

parameters.name: UAA_USER
parameters.description: UAA db user as used in configuration post-flight job

parameters.name: UAA_PW_FILE
parameters.description: UAA db user's password file as used in configuration post-flight job

parameters.name: FLIGHTRECORDER_PORT
parameters.description: Port number to advertise for flightrecorder

parameters.name: RPMGR_DB_TYPE
parameters.description: Database type to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_USER
parameters.description: Database username to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: Database secret file location to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_HOST
parameters.description: Database hostname to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_PORT
parameters.description: Database port to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_SSL_MODE
parameters.description: Database SSL mode to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_ROOT_CERTIFICATE_FILE
parameters.description: Database SSL root certificate to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
parameters.description: Database connection timeout to use in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_PGSQL_BINARY_PARAMETERS
parameters.description: Database - send byte[] parameters as binary data in rpmgr

parameters.name: RPMGR_TLS_KEY
parameters.description: SSL private key file to use in rpmgr for TLS API access

parameters.name: RPMGR_TLS_CERTIFICATE
parameters.description: SSL certificate file to use in rpmgr for TLS API access

parameters.name: IPMGR_DB_TYPE
parameters.description: Database type to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_USER
parameters.description: Database username to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: Database secret file location to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_HOST
parameters.description: Database hostname to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_PORT
parameters.description: Database port to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_SSL_MODE
parameters.description: Database SSL mode to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_ROOT_CERTIFICATE_FILE
parameters.description: Database SSL root certificate to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
parameters.description: Database connection timeout to use in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_PGSQL_BINARY_PARAMETERS
parameters.description: Database - send byte[] parameters as binary data in ipmgr

parameters.name: IPMGR_TLS_PRIVATE_KEY
parameters.description: SSL private key file to use in ipmgr for TLS API access

parameters.name: IPMGR_TLS_CERTIFICATE
parameters.description: SSL certificate file to use in ipmgr for TLS API access

parameters.name: DOCKER_VOLUME_SIZE
parameters.description: Default Docker Volume size for new VMs (in GB)

parameters.name: ROOT_VOLUME_SIZE
parameters.description: Default Root Volume size for new VMs (in GB)

parameters.name: SHARED_VOLUME_SIZE
parameters.description: Size of the volume on which shared filesystems will be provisioned (in GB)

parameters.name: RPMGR_KEEP_TERRAFORM
parameters.description: Keep Terraform files around after completion (for debugging purposes)

parameters.name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT_PK_FILE
parameters.description: Filename of the file containing the rivate key to sign/verify the kubernetes api service account token with

parameters.name: uaa-client-secret
parameters.description: Client secret for UAA admin client

parameters.name: uaa-token-signing-key
parameters.description: Private key for UAA signing token

parameters.name: uaa-token-verification-key
parameters.description: Public key for UAA signing token

parameters.name: service-account-pk
parameters.description: Kubernetes API Service Account Pibate Key to sign/validate tokens with

parameters.name: TOKEN_VERIFICATION_KEY_FILE
parameters.description: Location of file containing verification key for UAA tokens

parameters.name: IPMGR_CATALOG_LOCATION
parameters.description: Location of service/instance catalog in S3

parameters.name: AWS_WINDOWS_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: The AWS Windows password file on disk

parameters.name: OS_WINDOWS_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: The OpenStack Windows password file on disk

parameters.name: REPOSITORY_PATH
parameters.description: Path to the docker registry to use as the default image repository

parameters.name: CA_KEY_FILE
parameters.description: File containing the CA certificate key

parameters.name: HCP_DOMAIN_NAME
parameters.description: Domain Name to use for the HCP install

parameters.name: RPMGR_WAIT_TIME_BEFORE_DIE_MIN
parameters.description: Time to wait before killing self, in minutes

parameters.name: PGPOOL2_PORT
parameters.description: pgpool2 listening port. All pgsql clients should connect to this port

parameters.name: PGPOOL2_AUTH_TIMEOUT
parameters.description: pgpool2 client authentication timeout in seconds. Increase this value if pgpool2 timed out before pgsql is ready during bootstrap

parameters.name: PGPOOL2_SEARCH_PRIMARY_TIMEOUT
parameters.description: The amount of time (in seconds) pgpool2 will spend searching for a primary pgsql instance before timing out. Increase this value if pgpool2 timed out before pgsql is ready during bootstrap

parameters.name: PGPOOL2_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: The filename of the password file used for authenticating against pgsql2. pgpool2 assumes it is under /etc/pgpool2. Must be the same password as that set in pgsql

parameters.name: PGPOOL2_ADMIN_ID
parameters.description: pgpool2 admin ID. Nothing to do with pgsql. Refer containers/pgpool2/pcp.conf

parameters.name: PGPOOL2_ADMIN_PASSWORD_FILE
parameters.description: pgpool2 admin password file. Nothing to do with pgsql. Refer containers/pgpool2/pcp.conf

parameters.name: POSTGRES_NUM_NODES
parameters.description: Number of PostgreSQL Nodes in the deployment

parameters.name: HEAPSTER_KUBELET_HTTPS
parameters.description: Flag to indicate whether to connect to kubelet using https

parameters.name: CERTIFICATE_KEY_SIZE
parameters.description: Default key size to use for certificate generation

parameters.name: HCP_DOCKER_REGISTRY_OVERRIDE
parameters.description: Allows for setting a default docker repository for images.

parameters.name: CATALOG_LIST
parameters.description: CatalogList declared to hold the catalogs list

parameters.name: DNS
parameters.description: DNS registered SAN to be used for HSM

parameters.name: tls-private-key-file
parameters.description:
Private key string for TLS with endlines preserved with '
'
parameters.example:
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

parameters.name: tls-cert-file
parameters.description:
Public key string for TLS with endlines preserved with '
'

parameters.name: generator-ca-private-key
parameters.description: Private key string for parameter generation ca certificate
parameters.example:
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

parameters.name: APP_VERSION_TAG
parameters.description: Internal flag - Allows overriden Docker image tags for HCP installation

parameters.name: RELEASE_CHANNEL
parameters.description: Release channel for catalog and artifacts (can be 'stable' or 'development')

parameters.name: HCP_REGISTRY_LOCATION
parameters.description: The registry containing the HCP images
